markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Murksight](/Feats.aspx?ID=5005) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=734" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 189 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

Your vision pierces through non-magical fog, mist, rain, and snow. You don’t take circumstance penalties to ranged attacks or Perception checks caused by non-magical precipitation, and your targeted attacks don’t require a flat check to succeed against a target concealed only by such effects.
name: Murksight

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 8" pfs="Standard" > Murksight Source Player Core pg. 189 2.0 --- Your vision pierces through non-magical fog, mist, rain, and snow. You don’t take circumstance penalties to ranged attacks or Perception checks caused by non-magical precipitation, and your targeted attacks don’t require a flat check to succeed against a target concealed only by such effects.
